text: Malcolm Marmorstein (August 9, 1928 – November 21, 2020) was an American screenwriter and director. He was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. He wrote the television screenplay for Dark Shadows and the screenplay for Pete's Dragon. He directed the comedies Dead Men Don't Die and Love Bites.
